name: What's Wrong With Me?
description:
WHAT'S WRONG WITH ME?

A few personal comments about the game:

1.First of all, this is not an easy game to play. I used it as an inner conversation with my inner voice, that one that tells you mean things and makes your life a little imposible. Every day is a fight between me and it. Some times i win, sometimes it wins. All the things you are going to read are sentences that appear when it wins. 

2.My inner voice is always mean,sharp and hurtful with me. I've tried to show this in the game.

3.Although all the darkness that appears here, the game worked as a therapy for me. 

4.Use ARROWS to move and interact.

5.You don't have to read all the opinions. I encourage you to finish the game directly when you start to feel overwhelmed. Take your time.
